mapper.select: SELECT PRODNO, PRODNAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT q.QNANO, p.PRODNO, p.PRODNAME, pi.PRODIMGPATH, pp.PRODPRICE FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PRODIMAGE pi ON p.PRODNO = pi.PRODNO LEFT JOIN PRODPRICE pp ON p.PRODNO = pp.PRODNO LEFT JOIN QNA q ON p.PRODNO = q.PRODNO WHERE q.QNANO = #{qnano} AND p.PRODNO != 9999
